caption.p: a Stable adsorption configuration of OER and ORR intermediates on NC and M-N 4/NC. b Calculated free energy landscape for OER and ORR on NC (green), Co-N 4 (blue) and Fe-N 4 (red)—embedded graphene at U = 0 V (left) and 1.23 V (right). c Structure of OH*, O*, OOH* adsorbed M-N 4 and the mechanisms in OER/ORR processes. The gray, blue, green, red, and yellow sphere are C, N, M (Fe, Co), O, and H atoms
